sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பிராயசித்தம் பண்ணு. பாவநிவிர்த்திசெய், மன்னி, அநுக்கிரகம் பண்ணு. அறைகளை உண்டு பண்ணு, களிகூரு, சமானமாகு, விருதாவாகு, நிக்கிரகப்பண்ணு
to cover, to purge, to make an atonement, to make reconciliation, to cover over with pitch
a) (Qal) to coat (to cover) with pitch
1) to cover over, to pacify, to propitiate
2) to cover over, to atone for sin, to make atonement for
3) to cover over, to atone for sin and persons by legal rites

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to cover (specifically with bitumen); figuratively to expiate or condone, to placate or cancel: - appease, make (an) atonement, cleanse, disannul, forgive, be merciful, pacify, pardon, to pitch, purge (away), put off, (make) reconcile (-liation).
Cognate: H3722, H3724, H3725, H3727
